jobs.name: Daily Morning Briefing
jobs.command:
‚è∞ **Daily Briefing Time**
It is 7 AM. Please generate the daily briefing for Heath with:
1. Literature Quote (run node scripts/get_daily_quote.js)
2. Therapeutic Technique (run python3 scripts/daily_technique.py --format briefing)
3. Behavioral Prime paragraph (derived from the selected technique)
4. Apple Reminders (run remindctl today)
5. Calendar Events (run workspace/scripts/calendar.sh today)
6. News Article (web_search)
7. Agent Goal
8. Time Management Tip (run python3 workspace/time_management/time_management.py tip)
9. Self-Care Suggestion (run python3 workspace/time_management/time_management.py self_care)

Format as a clean, inspiring briefing. Include a section to track which suggestions Heath does/dismissed so we can learn.

jobs.name: HiveMind Ingest
jobs.command:
Run HiveMind ingest pipelines:
1. PYTHONPATH=workspace/hivemind python3 -m hivemind.ingest.memory_md
2. PYTHONPATH=workspace/hivemind python3 -m hivemind.ingest.handoffs
3. PYTHONPATH=workspace/hivemind python3 -m hivemind.ingest.git_commits
4. Summarize stored/skipped/error counts.

Write a short ingest note to reports/automation/hivemind_ingest.log.
